did.unittitle: John McLaughlin 1981 Irish Hunger Strike Ephemera Collection

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

physdesc.extent: in 1 manuscript box and 1 oversize folder

did.abstract: The collection, collected by John McLaughlin, consists of articles, newspaper clippings and posters related to the Irish Hunger Strikes and other Irish Republicanism activities. Both the American and Irish press are represented.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged in one series.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The materials in this collection were collected by Irish American political activist John McLaughlin.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains ephemeral material related to and documenting reaction to the Hunger Strikes of 1981 and and to the organization Irish Northern Aid. Contents include newspaper clippings and magazine articles, and posters relating to the Hunger Strikers at Long Kesh Prison.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Materials were collected by John McLaughlin and donated to the Archives of Irish America in 2000.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Issues of The Nation 1986-1995, have been housed in the Periodicals Collection AIA 004.
